target.name: help
target.echo: ${pname}.all - build all FOCE service JARs and native code ${pname}.jars - build all FOCE service JARs (in ${dataDir}) ${pname}.install - build all FOCE service JARs (in ${siam_home}/ports) ${pname}.dist - SIAM instrument service tar.gz ${pname}.ctd - CTD(s) ${pname}.nortek - velocimeter(s) ${pname}.workhorse - ADCP(s) ${pname}.ph - pH sensor(s) ${pname}.analog - analog sensor(s) ${pname}.water - water sensor(s) ${pname}.cpu - CPU monitor ${pname}.thruster - thrusters ${pname}.valves - valves ${pname}.control - control system ${pname}.co2 - CO2 Subsystem monitor foce.native - native code

target.name: install
target.echo: Installing FOCE service jars in ${distPortDir}/swfoce2012 - complete

arg.line: -service org.mbari.siam.devices.seabird.sbe52mp.SBE52MP -mnem 'Seabird SBE52MP' -id 1642 -jar ${distPortDir}/swfoce2012/Seabird52MP-1642.jar -xml ${siam_home}/puckxml/1642.xml -add -classdir org/mbari/siam/devices/seabird/sbe52mp 'sampleSchedule = 60' 'powerPolicy = always' 'commPowerPolicy = sampling' 'currentLimitMa = 3000' 'log = false' 'defaultSkipInterval = -1' 'registryName = CTD1' 'rbnbServer=localhost' 'UUID = 1c79e112-2068-11dd-ac90-4fe18c62afe0'

-service org.mbari.siam.devices.seabird.sbe52mp.SBE52MP -mnem 'Seabird SBE52MP' -id 1733 -jar ${distPortDir}/swfoce2012/Seabird52MP-1733.jar -xml ${siam_home}/puckxml/1733.xml -add -classdir org/mbari/siam/devices/seabird/sbe52mp 'sampleSchedule = 60' 'powerPolicy = always' 'commPowerPolicy = sampling' 'currentLimitMa = 3000' 'log = false' 'defaultSkipInterval = -1' 'registryName = CTD2' 'rbnbServer=localhost' 'UUID = c56f6f75-4700-11de-af5a-f79e6eea29f6'
